MS MCQs

    Plan your deployment of Direct Routing in Teams

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is true about a hosted SBC solution?

      This is ideal for organizations with little or no expertise in telephone systems.

      Microsoft doesn’t recommend hosted SBC solutions.

      You’re responsible for SBC updates with a hosted solution.


    2. What is the purpose of a tenant dial plan?

      A tenant dial plan allows Teams users to make calls outside the organization.

      A tenant dial plan allows users to keep legacy dialing patterns, such as three-digit extension numbers.

      A tenant dial plan restricts users from making international calls.


    3. What’s the difference between a Downstream SBC and a Proxy SBC, when configuring local media optimization?

      The Downstream SBC doesn’t need an IP address.

      The Downstream SBC doesn’t have a public IP address.

      The Proxy SBC doesn’t have a public IP address.


    4. In which scenario should you configure a voice routing policy?

      You should only configure a voice routing policy to stop media being sent via the internet and Phone Service for users in the same building or on the same network.

      You should only configure a voice routing policy to stop users from making international calls.

      You configure a voice routing policy for all scenarios with Direct Routing.
